description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget `OrdersScreen` which displays a list of orders with their details. It includes UI components for representing each order and its individual lines, utilizing provider for state management and date formatting.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of orders or a message if there are no orders.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing an individual order card with expandable details.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for both `OrdersScreen` and `_OrderCard`, rendering the list of orders or order details.
